title: Bug 5340 - Cancelling add exception breakpoint has no effect
OB: When trying to cancel the process of adding an exception breakpoint in the breakpoints pane of the debug perspective, there is no effect.
EB: When the cancel button is clicked in the progress dialog of adding an exception breakpoint, the process should be cancelled and no exception breakpoint should be added.
SR:
1) Open the breakpoints pane in the debug perspective.
2) Click the J! button to add an exception breakpoint.
3) In the progress dialog, click cancel.
